meta.key_insight: Failed patterns often more profitable than successful patterns
meta.concept: When market rejects expected move, opposite move is powerful

failed_breakout.description: Price breaks resistance but quickly reverses back below

identification.false_signal: Within 1-5 candles, price back below resistance

fade_strategy.entry: When price closes back below resistance level
fade_strategy.stop: Above the false breakout high + 5 points buffer
fade_strategy.target: Previous support or measured move down
fade_strategy.rationale: Bulls trapped, must exit, creates selling pressure

failed_breakout.psychology: Breakout buyers trapped, forced to sell = momentum reversal

failed_breakdown.description: Price breaks support but quickly reverses back above

identification.false_signal: Within 1-5 candles, price back above support

fade_strategy.entry: When price closes back above support level
fade_strategy.stop: Below the false breakdown low + 5 points buffer
fade_strategy.target: Previous resistance or measured move up
fade_strategy.rationale: Bears trapped, must cover, creates buying pressure

failed_breakdown.psychology: Breakdown sellers trapped, forced to cover = momentum reversal

failed_head_and_shoulders.description: H&S pattern forms but neckline holds

identification.pattern_complete: Left shoulder, head, right shoulder formed

trading_strategy.entry: When neckline clearly holds with bullish candle
trading_strategy.rationale: Major reversal pattern failed = opposite direction strong

failed_head_and_shoulders.note: One of strongest reversal signals when major pattern fails

failed_double_top.description: Double top forms but breaks above instead of below

identification.actual_breakout: Instead breaks above peaks with volume

trading_strategy.entry: Break and close above double top peaks

failed_double_top.psychology: All sellers exhausted at double top, breakout traps shorts

failed_double_bottom.description: Double bottom forms but breaks below instead of above

identification.actual_breakdown: Instead breaks below lows with volume

trading_strategy.entry: Break and close below double bottom lows

failed_double_bottom.psychology: All buyers exhausted at double bottom, breakdown traps longs

bull_trap.description: False bullish signal that reverses quickly
common_forms: Bullish candle that reverses next candle

identification.closes_below_level: Price closes below the trap level

trading_strategy.entry: When trap confirmed by close below key level

bear_trap.description: False bearish signal that reverses quickly
common_forms: Bearish candle that reverses next candle

identification.closes_above_level: Price closes above the trap level

trading_strategy.entry: When trap confirmed by close above key level

failed_triangle_breakout.description: Triangle breaks one direction, reverses, breaks opposite

identification.real_break: Then breaks opposite direction with volume

trading_strategy.stop: Inside triangle or at false break level
trading_strategy.target: Full triangle height in new direction

failed_triangle_breakout.note: Triangles often fake first, real move second

stop_hunt_reversals.description: Price spikes to grab stops, then reverses hard

identification.volume_spike: Often volume spike on the hunt

trading_strategy.entry: When price closes back inside level after spike
trading_strategy.rationale: Liquidity grabbed, now real move begins

stop_hunt_reversals.timing: Often happens at London open or NY open

failed_pattern_against_trend.note: Trend reasserts after failed countertrend move

identification_checklist.initial_setup: Recognize the pattern attempting to form
identification_checklist.watch_volume: Low volume on break = higher failure probability

risk_management.position_sizing: Can use larger size - high win rate
risk_management.stop_placement: Beyond the false break extreme + buffer
risk_management.avoid: Don't fade first break - wait for confirmation

best_practices.patience: Wait for confirmation of failure before entry
best_practices.volume_matters: Low volume breaks more likely to fail
best_practices.context_check: Failed patterns in trend direction strongest
best_practices.trust_signal: Failed patterns very reliable - don't second guess

psychology.new_entries: Opposite side sees opportunity, enters aggressively
psychology.cascading_stops: Stop losses trigger more stop losses

asia.note: Good hunting ground for failed patterns

london_open.note: Watch first hour for failed breaks

ny_open.note: Failed patterns less frequent but still valid

key_principle: Market loves to trap the most traders before real move
